column4: Is it possible to view an encrypted wmv on linux without mediaplayer?
not that i know of.. it may depend on the encryption
all the encrpted wmv's ive seen are the kind you err... 'dont' want to let others know you are watching.
ive seen a huge # of malware/crudware riding alongside encrypted wmv's you can download.. i avoide all wmvs now a days.
